alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:49PM CDT until June 16 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... West central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... East central Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 549 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Waynesboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Silas, Coffeeville, Gilbertown and Toxey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
